plugin.name: google-docs
plugin.description: Read, write, and manage content in Google Docs documents
plugin.context: Use for reading document text, inserting content, appending text, creating new documents, and managing document content as structured input/output for agents

read_document.description: Read the full content and structure of a Google Docs document
read_document.usage_context: When user wants to read document text, extract content for processing, or retrieve structured document data

document_id.description: The ID of the document to read (from the URL or file ID)

include_formatting.description: Include text formatting information (bold, italic, etc.)

plain_text_only.description: Return only plain text content without structural elements

large_document.message: Cannot read documents larger than 100,000 characters at once. Please use a smaller document.

medium_document.message: Read document with approximately {estimated_chars} characters? This may take a moment to process.

char_count.description: Total character count in the document

content.description: Plain text content of the document

structured_content.description: Document structure with paragraphs and elements (when plain_text_only is false)

full_document.description: Complete document object with formatting (when include_formatting is true)

output_guidance.success_description: Returns document content as plain text or structured data with character count.

common_errors.auth_failed: Your Google Docs connection has expired. Please go to Settings → Connected Apps to reconnect Google Docs.
common_errors.document_not_found: The document was not found. Please check the document ID and ensure you have access.
common_errors.permission_denied: You don't have permission to access this document. Please request access from the owner.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: Too many requests in a short time. Please wait a moment and try again.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Google Docs permissions are insufficient. Please reconnect with full document access.

insert_text.description: Insert text at a specific position in the document
insert_text.usage_context: When user wants to insert text at a specific location, add content to existing sections, or update document content precisely

document_id.description: The ID of the document to insert text into

index.description: The character position where text should be inserted (1 = start of document, use -1 for end)

max_text_length.message: Cannot insert more than 50,000 characters at once. Please reduce the text size.

document_id.description: ID of the document that was modified

output_guidance.success_description: Confirms the text insertion with position and character count.

common_errors.auth_failed: Your Google Docs connection has expired. Please reconnect in Settings → Connected Apps.
common_errors.document_not_found: The document was not found. Please check the document ID.
common_errors.invalid_index: The insertion index is invalid. Index must be within document bounds.
common_errors.permission_denied: You don't have permission to edit this document. Please request edit access.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: Too many write requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Google Docs write permissions are insufficient. Please reconnect with full access.

append_text.description: Append text to the end of the document
append_text.usage_context: When user wants to add content to the end of document, continuously append information, or log data without specifying positions

document_id.description: The ID of the document to append text to

add_line_break.description: Add a line break before appending the text

max_text_length.message: Cannot append more than 50,000 characters at once. Please reduce the text size.

document_id.description: ID of the document that was modified

output_guidance.success_description: Confirms the text was appended with document title and character count.

common_errors.auth_failed: Your Google Docs connection has expired. Please reconnect in Settings → Connected Apps.
common_errors.document_not_found: The document was not found. Please check the document ID.
common_errors.permission_denied: You don't have permission to edit this document. Please request edit access.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: Too many append requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Google Docs write permissions are insufficient. Please reconnect with full access.

create_document.description: Create a new Google Docs document
create_document.usage_context: When user wants to create a new document for writing content, starting a new project, or generating reports

title.description: The title/name of the new document

initial_content.description: Optional initial text content to add to the document

large_initial_content.message: Create document with {initial_content_length} characters of initial content?

document_id.description: Unique identifier for the new document

document_url.description: URL to open the document in Google Docs

output_guidance.success_description: Returns the new document ID, URL, and title.

common_errors.auth_failed: Your Google Docs connection has expired. Please reconnect in Settings → Connected Apps.
common_errors.quota_exceeded: You've reached your document creation limit. Please try again later.
common_errors.invalid_title: The document title is invalid or too long. Please use a shorter title.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: Too many creation requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Google Docs creation permissions are insufficient. Please reconnect with full access.

get_document_info.description: Get metadata and information about a document
get_document_info.usage_context: When user wants to explore document properties, get title and ID, or check document metadata before reading/writing

document_id.description: The ID of the document to get information about

include_content_summary.description: Include summary of document content (character count, paragraph count, etc.)

end_index.description: End index of document content for positioning text

output_guidance.success_description: Returns document metadata and optionally content statistics.
